content: this legal text discusses the division of property between two individuals referred to as cm and cmv the properties in question include a building with apartments a gym and a school the text provides detailed descriptions of the properties including their cadastral income and category the parties have agreed to divide the properties into two shares with cm receiving one share and cmv receiving the other each share includes specific real estate units within the buildings the total value of each share is stated as €190000 the text also mentions the involvement of other individuals in the inheritance of the properties
